summary: A personal experiment to add a simple free home to Riverville.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#00ffff][size=6][font=Courier New]Riverville Watchtower[/font]
[/size][/color][/center]
[center]Requires:
Skyrim (and update)
Enderal
Enderal Launcher

This was a lovely little experiment for a starter player home with, admittedly, a few higher-level pieces of equipment for those looking to get through the arduous first few levels with ease. The watchtower is situated right next to the Riverville tavern, left behind by a Keeper to perform their duties in Ark. The home has an enchanting and alchemy station, fair storage, a player bed, so forth. Other stations exist in Riverville proper.
The new items in question are a slightly stronger and faster 1-h keeper sword, an unenchanted Kilean bow, Assassin gloves/boots and a city guard cuirass and shield.
Admittedly, it does not have many bells nor whistles. It's pretty spartan. But if you like elegance in simplicity, I hope you enjoy!

Enderal was an amazing experience in my first playthru, and the second is sure to provide more of the same. This was more of a personal mod, and may not fit the bill for some others, and that's okay! I may have the ambition sometime soon to make a whole new settlement in Enderal to honor the remarkable work of the SureAI team.

Walk blessed![/center]
author: ClefJ
